item.title: Kubernetes API Server
item.description: Although kubelet could watch a directory and run pods found configured under that directory, but in a Kubernetes cluster, kubelet will get most its pods to run from the Kubernetes API server. Kubernetes stores all its cluster state in etcd, a distributed data store with a strong consistency model. This state includes what nodes exist in the cluster, what pods should be running, which nodes they are running on, and a whole lot more.
